Chris Burdess <dog@...> writes:

> Yohanes Santoso wrote:
>> Chris Burdess <dog@...> writes:
> Note, we don't DELETE the queue URL, we DELETE the message URL.

Apology. The above and

> As I said the queue provides a list of the message URLs.

made me realised that I misread your previous email. Somehow, I split
your email into two parts, one proposing a DELETE on the queue URL and
the other on retrying repeatedly.

The only excuse I can offer is it was lunch hour and I was
multi-tasking between replying and eating. Some of my blood was being
307-ed to the stomach.

YS.
